ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE FRANÇOIS ROLLAND of Montréal, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
